title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message:
820-2850 has some common ram socket problems? Support 8GB?
Sometimes working on videos on youtube beeps 3 times and freeze.

title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message: Probably one bad socket, usually the one you put the RAM in first. Max. out the good slot, the one closest to the bottom of the machine. Not fixable.

title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message: Now appears artefacts when touch the board or make pression here and there. Could be the mux?

title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message: Usually the MUX on these yes. Should not lock up or crash of course!

title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message: Reflow is ok, or need replaced?

title: 820-2850 ram socket problems?
message: MUX can be reflowed but need to very carefully remove ALL the glue. If you mess this up it will be reball time and that sucks.
